Body: Possible Duplicate:  Aoson M19 — Need Device Drivers  Myself and a few others have an extra Aoson M19 android tablet on hand, but can't seem to find any USB device drivers for it. I assume this is because it isn't an overly popular tablet.Does anyone know where some drivers could be found? Perhaps someone wrote their own?I have already tried the Google drivers and the drivers providers listed on developer.android.com- please don't point me there.Thanks.
Title: Aoson M19 -- Device Drivers

history.Text: Myself and a few others have an extra Aoson M19 android tablet on hand, but can't seem to find any USB device drivers for it. I assume this is because it isn't an overly popular tablet.Does anyone know where some drivers could be found? Perhaps someone wrote their own?I have already tried the Google drivers and the drivers providers listed on developer.android.com- please don't point me there.Thanks.
